item.title: Nobody can compete with rapid, smart giving. It is a space seldom occupied
item.description: Smart and fast giving and sharing makes a good network. Credit the quote to Kevin Doyle Jones, as part of an exchange on Twitter with Jerry Michalski, questioning why someone would go to the trouble of putting out a big, interesting, free newsletter and then not expose some of its insights to the network beyond that of its current subscriber base.
